mainText:
Steve.

Good bye, no one will fit your shoes.

When another genius like you appears in this 
world, I know will be god, you are god you are 
forever, do not forget your computer, you will 
need it to keep innovating, heaven will bless 
you, you bless me,  windows will freeze my pc 
and you will not be here  to help me, bless me 
on my ciber future.
author: Lucio
